contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|speaker}} '''Speaker''' may refer to: * [[Public speaker]], one who gives a speech or lecture * [[Speaker (politics)]], the presiding officer in a legislative assembly * [[Loudspeaker]], an electromechanical device which produces sound :* [[Computer speaker]] * [[HMS Speaker (D90)|HMS ''Speaker'' (D90)]], a WWII Royal Navy aircraft carrier * Speaker, in linguistics, a [[grammatical person]], first person as opposed to the addressee and bystanders *''[[The Speaker]]'', a BBC television series *[[Los Speakers]] (or "The Speakers"), a Colombian rock band from the 1960s {{disambig}}
